posts.post_content:
Posted By: Richard Dwyer
Can't remember who it was that had framed reprints, but that won't do anyway.  This year I'm going to be displaying my T206 boxes at the County fair.  I need reprints of all the backs and reprints of fronts that belong to those backs.  (Anyone will do, as long as they were on that back)

If you have what I need, and a sensible price, email me at richarddwyer@sbcglobal.net

Posted By: hennessey
jeff kennedy had them on page 2, he might have what your looking for, if you e-mail him

Posted By: Jim VB
Also, click on "Vintage Links" at the top of the page and contact Trae Regan. He may be able to help.

Posted By: Trae R.
Hi Richard,

I did something like what you're requesting for someone else on the board a year ago.

[IMG]http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1200/1261090890_29e255c49c_o.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1096/1261090630_7c7c9c1fd8_o.jpg[/IMG]

Honestly, it isn't fast, cheap, or easy though. Please contact me if you're interested.

trae@t206.org

Alternatively I sell back reprint sets that may help with your end-goal:
[url]http://www.t206.org/products.php[/url]

Thanks,
-Trae

 
 
 
---
"There ain't much to being a ballplayer, if you're a ballplayer."
-Honus Wagner
Do you sell a reprint of the Red Cobb with the Ty Cobb Cigarettes back? If so, I'd like to have one as a placeholder which will likely never be replaced by a real one.
